website_summaries.verdict: A fun costume set that will fit most body types and works well for friends as well as couples.
pros: Costume set includes a bar of soap costume, a loofah costume, and 10 clear balloons with Velcro
Both are One Size Fits Most and comfortable
cons: Velcro balloon attachments don't stick very well to the costumes
The loofah costume tends to ride up a bit, so dress accordingly

customer_reviews.title: We won the costume contest!
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the size 6 model on the pkg fool you! I'm a size 2x and my husband (lift weights) is very wide across the chest. The loofah fit me just fine (it's stretchable) and the soap fits him. Now while we were slipping the soap over his head and putting his big arms through it tore a bit in the armpit area but that was okay cause you couldn't see the tear. Overall the costume is awesome and unique.
customer_reviews.author: S. Zachery

customer_reviews.title: Great costumes!
customer_reviews.text: Had to edit my review. (I originally only gave 3 starts because the balloons and velcro were missing from my package. Now I feel horrible because my husband tried the soap costume on today and the balloons and velcro fell out of the costume and onto the floor. MY BAD!) Now I am very pleased with our costumes and can't wait to wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S

customer_reviews.title: Soap is the problem
customer_reviews.text: Liked the Loofah! Cute and comfortable to wear but the problem was the soap costume. It’s a thick material and not comfortable enough to roam around. If you like to sit just at one place with it that’ll be fine but going out in a car was an eventful situation. Getting out of car wearing this costume seemed like a hassle!
customer_reviews.author: Trina94

customer_reviews.title: Great buy with a few issues.
customer_reviews.text: Very fun and whimsical! I am about a size 3x and I still was able to wear it even though it isn’t branded as plus size it had some stretch to it. The reason I didn’t give it 5 stars was because some of the pieces of the loofa started coming off soI had to sew it to stay on. Otherwise it was great. I wish they made it with a little bit more stretch and I wish they found a better way to keep the balloons ( soap bubbles) on.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: COMPLIMENTS ALL NIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: HAPPY LOOFAH! lol No regrets! I upgraded the look with better balloons & a great wig also found on Amazon! UBER COMPLIMENTS all night!! My hubby did not attend this event but he is a 2XL athletic build 18” neck 18” arms. I will def have to cut open the soap box shirt or theres is no way he will fit! Ill post again on Halloween
customer_reviews.author: Ms. M

customer_reviews.title: Took longer than expected during shipping. Pinned balloons in ...
customer_reviews.text: Took longer than expected during shipping. Pinned balloons in place as Velcro sticky’s don’t work. Had much trimming to do on Luffa. It is cute and received many compliments on costume. Luffa not long enough to go without leggings for 5’8”.
customer_reviews.author: FL gal

customer_reviews.title: Great value and so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This costume was perfect! The reviews helped us decide on this, the fit was great for both my husband and I since neither one of us are small people. We really enjoyed it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Tiernan

customer_reviews.title: It was a huge hit!
customer_reviews.text: Costume was perfect for our Halloween party. The fit was perfect and price was just right. The only reason why I gave 4 instead of 5 stars is because the balloons kept falling off and got in the way.
customer_reviews.author: White

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat Two Costumes For This Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great costumes for the price. Bonus: they washed well in the washing machine. My only complaint is that the balloons fell off easily. It would be better if the hook and loop was stitched on the Soap costume because the sticky part does not stick well to its foam-like fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: To whom it may concern, I was very dissatisfied/disappointed with what I recieved in the mail . When I opened up the packaging to the balloons (which was part of the costume) , I was in disgust because there were dead bugs inside . They looked really really old . The packaging looked old as well . I threw the packaging of the balloons out immediately! I was disappointed because I had ordered this item for a Halloween competition. But yet , the costume was not complete because we couldn’t use the balloons .
customer_reviews.author: Samantha F

customer_reviews.title: Fun and cute costumes for a couple!
customer_reviews.text: We loved these costumes! They fit well and were a hit at the party! My husband is 6'5" and I am 5'5". The loofah was a bit loose but didn't require any adjustments. The velcro attachments for the balloons kept falling off but that was minor to us.
customer_reviews.author: DUO

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These are cute costumes however the loofah was so incredibly itchy you HAVE to wear a shirt with sleeves which makes it look weird in my opinion. It's not comfortable for long wear, I wore it max 30 minutes the whole night. I can't speak for the "soap" since I didn't wear it but it creases bad when you sit down and rises up to the neck. Overall these are just small grievances as they're only for one day of the year and I would say if you really like the idea go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Rios

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, love it !
customer_reviews.text: I have not worn this yet, my review is based on what I see. Very satisfied with the quality. I'm a so 12-14 (L) and when I tried it on, it fit, my man is 240lbs, 6'2" and the soap fit him. Very satisfied, we were the talk of the party. It was very comfortable. I'm a 12 and I had plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: This was a super cute costume!!! I’m a size 2-4 and the loofah worked. I wore net stockings and white booties and denim sorta under (but u couldn’t see shorts) soap for my husband well 6 ft 200 lbs and he used a bubble gun to enhance his costume. I used the balloons with Velcro and worked well
customer_reviews.author: Kuran Malhotra

customer_reviews.title: It was a cute but the soap costume...
customer_reviews.text: It was cute ! I’m 5,2 and wore the soap costume. We wore it for a Halloween contest and received a lot of compliments . However I disliked that the balloons velcro didn’t stick for long. Also I didn’t like that the interior of the soap costume messed up my shirt and leggings . WARNING do not wearing any spandex material under the soap costume only or it will ruin it . It made my long sleeve shirt look like when you wear a swimsuit and the concrete of inside of a pool touches it . Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would suggest wearing a dress under the loofah because it does ride up a bit but otherwise its perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute in person, I would suggest wearing a dress under the loofah because it does ride up a bit but otherwise its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and ORIGINAL
customer_reviews.text: Had to be one of the best costume i’d ever bought we were the talk of the party so comfy cute and ORIGINAL deff would buy again. 100% if you’re looking to win a costume party this is it. I made my own head band got them for dollar tree and i just hot glued the rubber duck but deff an original and comfortable costume for both people! Dont rethink it- NOT SPONSORED !
customer_reviews.author: Kayla demorales

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I give it 4 stars because 1) the costume arrived a lot sooner than expected, and 2) because the loofah is so fluffy and bouncy and pink and adorbs and I can’t wait to wear it! The 1 star is because the costume is obviously used! $60 for a used costume. The Soap costume is filthy around the armpits and a stain on the chest area. Shame on you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Didn't tell my fiancé I was ordering this costume set but for our daughter 1 Halloween she was going to be a duck so of course I though this would be too cute for us. He wore the soap bar a whole 10mins but I loved my loofa hid my post baby body
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful when I saw all the reviews but the product I received was unacceptable. The soap costume was covered with dirt and red stains. I tried to clean it but it didn't help. Plus, the velcro does not work to attach the balloons. I couldn't salvage it as a costume at all so I immediately returned it. Maybe others had better luck with the package they received.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Easy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great costume, and despite the "one size fits most", they both fit great. My boyfriend added some reinforcements to the Soap to keep its shape, but it probably would have been more comfortable if he just used it as is. We added a few features, but overall everyone loved our costumes, they were a bigger hit than I imagined.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: This was more than half the price of all the other soap and loofa costumes I looked at! It's a little short but I am very tall so it was expected! Great quality for the price! I would highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Best reviewed I could find on Amazon last minute
customer_reviews.text: It was cute. We styled it with all white underneath. The bubbles are a fun touch but they do not stay on.
customer_reviews.author: DivaDebra

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap ass crap!
customer_reviews.text: Actually very nice. No complaints about anything. Not a cheap ass, too small, costume. Worked out really well.
customer_reviews.author: EGR460

customer_reviews.title: Best costume!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I wore these to a charity function. They were a huge hit and fit perfectly. The quality is great. The balloons didn’t stay on all night but that wasn’t a deal breaker for me. I just wish we had another party to go to.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: This costume was a hit! Easy to wear and fun to celebrate Halloween! Needed to wear shorts (biker shorts) under the loofah dress just to feel more comfortable dancing and moving.
customer_reviews.author: Barby Garibaldi

customer_reviews.title: Confortable, it can fit many sizes!
customer_reviews.text: Súper confortable, brings the balloons for a better effect. We added them out in the parking-lot. Got many compliments. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Creative!
customer_reviews.text: The custome was made of good material. My husband and I were a hit. I wore tights underneath and heels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We LOVED the costumes!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I loved the costumes!! They were a big hit! Fit fine!
customer_reviews.author: L.G.

customer_reviews.title: This was a great costume! Everyone loved it
customer_reviews.text: This was a great costume! Everyone loved it!!! You might need better velcro for the balloon bubbles mine kept falling off but it was fantastic!!! My husband is a larger guy and he said his was great as well. The dress is bit short so I put little shorts on under.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved this costume set.
customer_reviews.text: This was a real hit at the Halloween party we went to. Don’t hesitate to buy this. The quality was was great, better than expected. Because of past reviews stating the balloons did not stay on, I sewed them and it worked great. I also added rope to the soap.
customer_reviews.author: G. Buck

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & Cute
customer_reviews.text: The costume was so cute, and very comfortable! I needed to safety pin a few of the layers because it hung too low/separate. The costume was easy and adorable. Highly recommended !
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fun costume!
customer_reviews.text: This duo-costume was a big hit at this year's Halloween party...so much so that we won "best overall costume"!
customer_reviews.author: Tstone

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: Just Amazing. All my friends loved the custom and fitted as expected. Balloons fall down and they bump with everything but just incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Tijerina

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume!
customer_reviews.text: This costume was a hit! It was cute and comfortable. It was a little short, so I wore white boy shorts underneath. The balloons also did not stick on the soap costume. I would definitely recommend this costume.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy P.

customer_reviews.title: I loved this costume
customer_reviews.text: I loved this costume!!!!! It was a little big (I’m 5’1) but it’s one size fits all and looked cute with leggings! The soap fit my boyfriend perfectly. The only reason I’m not giving it 5 stars is because it was missing the Velcro to add the balloons. Overall it was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Chicago gal

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: Great quality costume for the price and easily the comfiest costume I’ve ever worn. My boyfriend is a big guy- 250+ lbs and it fit him just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality costumes
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how fast the parcel came and the condition and quality of the costume. Looked fantastic. Was not happy with $25 shipping fee. But overall was happy with costumes and their price.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Chmelyk

customer_reviews.title: Nice and fit well
customer_reviews.text: This was a winner a the Halloween Party. Was a lil bit pricey for me, but it did include two customs
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Loved the costume
customer_reviews.text: Loved the costume, really cute and comfortable. The soap outfit already started ripping at the bottom but other than that it’s a great costume
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lescell

customer_reviews.title: The BEST costume! It was a hit and next year ...
customer_reviews.text: The BEST costume! It was a hit and next year we are going to dress our little one as a rubber ducky next year-
customer_reviews.author: Jessyca Skye Hix

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume!
customer_reviews.text: Great Costume! Perfect for Hubby and I, nice quality, and very comfortable! Received many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Kevdee

customer_reviews.title: Great couple costume!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about the costume. Very stretchy and comfortable. The “soap” costume was a little difficult, from what I seen. He had to take it off completely every time he had to use the restroom.
customer_reviews.author: Percila Torres

customer_reviews.title: Costume Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say about this costume!!! I got so many compliments!!!! I would say I’m a large and it fit still perfectly!!! It does have stretch!!! Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: chenl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit great! Lots of compliments and we had a unique couples outfit at the Halloween party.
customer_reviews.author: N. Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Greay
customer_reviews.text: Cute costumes, in a pinch, we turned it up!! P.s. great coverage, HAPPY Holidays!!! 😁
customer_reviews.author: jennifer huettinger

customer_reviews.title: Fun couples costume!
customer_reviews.text: Great for party...wife got lots of feedback for sexy look with hose and sexy boots at party! Great quality for price!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: Actually ordered it for my 13yr daughter and she just wanted the loofah. She got so many complements. And it fitted perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: alexandria

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like picture, we wore these and were a hit.
customer_reviews.author: cdnelsonrn

customer_reviews.title: So Fun !
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed this costume so much, was a big hit in the neighborhood:)
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marie

customer_reviews.title: I love it !
customer_reviews.text: Both costumes fit perfect !! my husband and I won best costume
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for small girls
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Reviews said ok for bigger girls.. not true. I'm 16/18 and it was too tight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We had so much fun w these costumes
customer_reviews.text: We were such a hit at the party! We had so much fun with the costumes!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a quick funny costume idea
customer_reviews.text: Didnt end up using the soap costume. But the loofah was perfect and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best Couple Costume!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable! We kept getting stopped for photos and won a costume contest! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got to me on time and was a hit at the halloween parties.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Hillestad

customer_reviews.title: unique
customer_reviews.text: No one at the party had it, great couples costume!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. It was a hit at the Halloween party we attended!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Had adjustable transparent straps to adjust however and box soap fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Madyson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!! High quality and got tons of compliments. I had 3 people ask if they could use it next year. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra kutscherousky

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute costume! Perfect if you aren’t trying to break the bank
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: This costume was fun. We added yarn to the soap so it ...
customer_reviews.text: This costume was fun. We added yarn to the soap so it looked like hair, lol. I glued a rubber duck on a headband and wore that. He wore a white body suit under the soap. Nice costume but the loofah was a bit big - I'm a size 6. They are one size fits all I understand!
customer_reviews.author: R Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and it felt like how a real one does
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The loffa was a bit small had to wear pants under it
customer_reviews.text: Great other then the balloons kept falling off the soap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these costumes
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit. Im 5'3" 150 lbs. Highly recommend these costumes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s so cute, but it’s wayyyyy too big for me, 5’1,115lb.
customer_reviews.author: yokoshiwa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We were very happy with this costume. We got a lot of compliments at our halloween party.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Loveee
customer_reviews.text: We loved out costumes! Fit great , super comfy !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better be prepared to show some leg if ur wearing the loofah!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: everyone loved it! I’m 5 2 and my boyfriend is ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, everyone loved it! I’m 5 2 and my boyfriend is 6 3
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wirt

customer_reviews.title: This was very cute and simple - and of a ...
customer_reviews.text: This was very cute and simple - and of a decent quality. The only negative was that the clear straps were attached backwards. That being said, no one but me noticed that I had to wear the costume backwards (the loofah string was in the back).
customer_reviews.author: AsiaM

customer_reviews.title: pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: No too shabby at all. pretty good quality. there was a pen mark on the soap but i'm not so sure i even care. this election left us feeling not so fresh.
customer_reviews.author: NATASHA S.

product_meta.title: Soap Loofah Bubbles Adult Costume Set
feature_bullets: Includes: 1 Soap Bar Costume, 1 Loofah costume, AND 10 clear balloons
Both costumes are One Size Fits Most
Double sided velcro for the balloons are included for ballons to stick to imitate bubbles
Unique and creative idea for friends or couples
